description:
The injured Misaki spends a night at the hopsital, and finds herself rapidly growing closer with Akira, who stayed with her the whole time. Due to a secret agreement between the head of M&M Music (The company representing the Sakuradan), Itsuki
Kanzaki, and Ogata Productions` Eiji, Rina is forced to change the venue she was going to perform her concert in.
She angrily agrees to the change, but on one condition: Touya must be hired again as her private staff. As a show of her resolution towards the concert, Yuki entrusts Yayoi with a letter for Touya.
Touya visited "Echoes" with Rina, and speaks with Misaki, but is rudely brushed off by Akira. Drawing inspiration from a conversation she had with Touya, Rina comes up with a bold plan for Christmas Eve...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hitorizumou ga Munashii no wa, Hitori Dakaratte Dake ja Nai. Kankyaku no Me ga, Itainda
Sumo Wrestling by Yourself Isn`t Lonely Just Because You Don`t Have a Partner. The Eyes of the Audience Sting, Too.
一人相撲が虚しいのは, 一人だからってだけじゃない. 観客の目が, 痛いんだ
